page.title: 15St Davids Sea Life Centre
page.content: Two St.Davids men have put up plans for a sea life centre.Its purpose is to simulate a natural sea enviroment.They will keep fish, crabs, shellfish and other sea creatures in big 20ft. diameter tanks.The fish will be in glass tanks so that school children and students can study their habits. Also visitors can come and see them. Perhaps it will show people how to conserve sea life, considering that the sea covers many parts of the earth.The National Park planning commitee have approved the plans and the two businessmen now have to raise the capital to finance their venture.
